title: HPE's server and hybrid cloud revenue go into reverse amid historical hardware splurge
description: Never mind, says jolly green giant, we’re a networking-centric company now HPE has revealed its revenue from servers and hybrid cloud products has gone backwards but insisted that’s nothing to worry because it’s now poised to profit from its acquisition of Ju…
content:
HPE has revealed its revenue from servers and hybrid cloud products has gone backwards but insisted thats nothing to worry because its now poised to profit from its acquisition of Juniper Networks.
… [+2013 chars]
